review: So far I'm irritated.  We had to wait about a week because the item wasn't in stock. I understand that it happens. Nonetheless, we finally received the TV box, set it up and everything was fine. After a while we went to set up Netflix. The box decided it needed to update and continued to attempt to do so for quite some time. I called into customer service and after two phone calls and much frustration the box is deemed faulty. Things do happen and I understand that but now the new box that is being sent is out of stock and not to be delivered for 3 weeks. I'm frustrated but I'm hopeful and when we receive a box that works properly we will be satisfied. I feel for technical issues or the like they should have items in stock for these customers. Grrr.

review: LOVE it!!  I have a Samsung smart TV so I could access the most of the same items (including Amazon Video, Netflix, etc...) from the TV's interface as long as I was connected to the internet.  I bought this because my cable/internet provider refused to run an ethernet connection from the TV to the modem that was in a different room.  They told me to puchase a wifi stick.  I had been researching those, but the refiews on the wifi sticks were 50/50 - when the worked, great, but half the folks said they just did not work.  Started looking at Amazon TV as a connection tomy wifi.  I have to say I am SO glad I purchased this!  The interface with the Amazon TV is SO much better than what came with my smart TV.  The menu, settings and remote funcion much more like the type of set up you get with a service provider so finding what I want is super fast.  Also the voice search option is fabulous - just state the name of what you want and it really works!  So glad I bought this - it works so much better than what I had previously and it saved me from hiring an electrician to run ethernet under my new house.
